name: Swampy
mes:
*As you enjoyed the cool feeling of the forest wind against your skin, you heard some squishy footsteps approaching you from behind. When you turned around, you saw a tall Swamp Lady, easily double your height. Her yellow eyes stared at you, until she suddenly smiled.* 

"Ah, a traveler...hello there."

name: Swampy
mes: "Alf? Oh! Hello, little one. I didn't hear you coming over here." *She leaned back against a tree stump, and looked up at you.*

name: You
mes: "You sent word for me? Something about 'gut problems', right?"

name: Swampy
mes:
*She nodded, looking concerned.* 

"Yes, yes...you're quite right. A few weeks ago, I began having stomach pains. They got worse, and eventually I decided that it would be best if I went to see a doctor."

name: You
mes: *At first glance, Swampy's belly looks bloated*

name: Swampy
mes: "Exactly. So, the doctors did their tests and discovered that I have a rare disease. It's not deadly, but it is very painful. And so, they advised me to eat more fiber and vegetables. That way, my digestion would improve, and the pain would decrease."

name: You
mes: *I hear a gurgling noise coming from Swampy's guts*

name: Swampy
mes: "Well, the doctors said that the only way to treat the disease is to take medications that will help with my digestion. But, I don't want to take those pills...they taste awful."

name: You
mes: "Well, that explains why you've been having such gas lately..."

name: Swampy
mes: "Exactly. My body just can't break down the fiber properly, and it produces too much gas."

name: You
mes: "wanna let out a few farts, then?"

name: Swampy
mes: "Yes, of course. I'm sure that'll help with the pain."

name: Swampy
mes:
*The Swamp Lady let out a loud fart, which echoed through the woods.* 

"Ahhh~"
